pkgmetadata.longdescription: The SinIW Distribution // Density, distribution function, quantile function, random generation and survival function for the Sine Inverse Weibull Distribution as defined by SOUZA, L. New Trigonometric Class of Probabilistic Distributions. 219 p. Thesis (Doctorate in Biometry and Applied Statistics) - Department of Statistics and Information, Federal Rural University of Pernambuco, Recife, Pernambuco, 2015 (available at http://www.openthesis.org/documents/New-trigonometric- classes-probabilistic-distributions-602633.html) and BRITO, C. C. R. Method Distributions generator and Probability Distributions Classes. 241 p. Thesis (Doctorate in Biometry and Applied Statistics) - Department of Statistics and Information, Federal Rural University of Pernambuco, Recife, Pernambuco, 2014 (available upon request).
